House of Commons Petition e-4934.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to Pass a motion in Parliament that condemns the deceptive and manipulative tactics of anti-abortion 'crisis pregnancy centres' [open for signatures until aug 16, 2024]

House of Commons Petition e-4827.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to make permanent the Sexual and Reproductive Health Fund for community-based projects, and mandate that provinces expand abortion and other sexual and reproductive health services [open for signatures until sept 3, 2024]

National Network of Abortion Funds.description: Network of 100 independent abortion funds working to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access
